alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:06AM CST until January 29 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the creek will occur with Willards Camp Road as well as other secondary roads near the creek flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 16.5 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Whisky Chitto Creek Mittie 15.0 12.1 Wed 9 am CST 15.8 16.4 15.1 &&
